articles.description: There’s no need to compromise on performance when you’re buying budget headphones. Here’s our guide to the best bargains around, from wired over-ears to Bluetooth earbuds
articles.content: Whether you’re passionate about punk or prog or have a hankering for hard rock and metal, there’s no need to compromise on performance if you want the best budget headphones for music. We’ve found yo… [+9617 chars]
